Articles.Content:
I wanted to say thank you to SQUAD for Kerbal Space Program

Having time to spare, I decided to make this video as a thank you for KSP

Thank you SQUAD for this solar system.
Nice job man, though I'm not sure if I would call it an animation.

Nice job man, though I'm not sure if I would call it an animation.

thank you for the compliment and yes is not an animation it is rather a video (or machinima.) but there is no prefix available
really good way of saying thank you, good job!
nice job! It makes such a simple launch seem so fantastic

Hi,

Nice video I enjoyed it.

I would like to give you a few tips though. Dont loop audio unless the breaks are clean (or use the same audio over and over either).

Changing pictures is somethin even I need to learn like fading in and out; makes it easier on the eyes; no worries tho; I am starting to make videos myself and so far it hasnt been a picnic for me.

Keep up the good work and hope to see more !

I need to crak out my keyboard and write music again; KSP kinda wins tho !

Cdr Zeta
Amazing video/animation, it was almost professional, in my opinion.

Dont loop audio unless the breaks are clean (or use the same audio over and over either).

I have not changed the music, everything is original "To Begin Again By Pix". loops are like that. a little "break" it gives an "experimental" side. Like kerbal

Amazing video/animation, it was almost professional, in my opinion.

Thanks ! I make videos for years but I'm not professional, I'm visual artist (photo, art installation, sculpture etc..) I use sometime the video. I learnt the steps by myself.

Thank you for your compliment

Ha, nice vid.

For some reason. whenever i see the [ANIMATION] prefix, i hope that it's something animated in one way or another, and not just a video. (which i guess videos are technically animations)

I don't even know why i'm saying this on THIS thread, there are a lot more that have the [ANIMATION] prefix.

Oh well. anywho. Still like the vid, just not sure why everyone is using [ANIMATION] prefix.
Very good vid. For me it captures the feel of KSP and just how cool this game is. Thank you for sharing it with the community.
